snippet.title: Warlords of the Deck is free Now On Steam
snippet.description:
We've fused Card Gaming with the Battle of Total War to create the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Combine a unique deck from different factions, rally your legions, and charge to defeat all your opponents!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2959310/Warlords_of_the_Deck/?curator_clanid=44917508
